Docs.summary: Image analysis class for face detection.

remarks.para: CIDetector is a general API to perform image analysis on an image, but as of iOS5 only face detection is supported. You initiate the face detection by calling the static method M:CoreImage.CIDetector.CreateFaceDetector(CoreImage.CIContext,bool) and then get the results by calling one of the FeaturesInImage overloads.
Instances of are expensive to initialize, so application developers should prefer to re-use existing instances rather than frequently creating new ones.
